name: Prasad Raju G
label: AI Engineer
summary: I am Prasad Raju, a Machine Learning and Deep Learning practitioner focused on turning ideas into meaningful products with real-world impact. My curiosity spans across science and technology from Computer Science and Mathematics to Physics, Chemistry, and Biology all driven by one fundamental question: ‚ÄúHow does the Universe work?‚Äù

research.title: Deep Learning Approaches for Medical Image Analysis
research.summary: Investigated the application of convolutional neural networks for automated detection of abnormalities in medical imaging, achieving 94% accuracy on benchmark datasets.
highlights: Developed a novel CNN architecture for medical image segmentation
Achieved state-of-the-art results on publicly available datasets
Published findings in peer-reviewed conference proceedings

research.title: Natural Language Processing for Sentiment Analysis
research.summary: Explored transformer-based models for sentiment classification in social media text, comparing BERT and RoBERTa architectures.
highlights: Fine-tuned pre-trained transformer models on custom datasets
Open-sourced the trained models and evaluation framework

notes.title: Understanding Backpropagation
notes.summary: Comprehensive notes on how backpropagation works in neural networks, including chain rule application and gradient computation.

notes.title: Docker Best Practices
notes.summary: A collection of best practices for writing efficient Dockerfiles and managing containers in production environments.

notes.title: Python Memory Management
notes.summary: Notes on how Python handles memory allocation, garbage collection, and optimization techniques for memory-intensive applications.

projects.title: Phonebook
projects.summary: The Flask-based Phonebook Web App enables users to efficiently manage contacts with full CRUD functionality, user authentication, password reset, and real-time input validation for a seamless experience.
highlights: User Authentication: Secure user login and registration.
Contact Management: Create, read, update, and delete contacts.
Password Reset: Easily reset passwords with expiration for security.
Real-time Validation: Validate user inputs in real-time with instant feedback.

images.caption: Save Contact by just Scanning QRs

projects.title: Music Genre Classification Using Convolution Neural Networks
projects.summary: Music genre classification is the task of automatically identifying the genre of a song based on its audio features. Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) are well-suited for this task because they can learn hierarchical features from spectrograms‚Äîvisual representations of audio signals.
highlights: Spectrogram-Based Learning: Converts audio signals into spectrogram images, allowing CNNs to extract frequency and temporal patterns.
Deep Feature Extraction: Uses convolutional layers to automatically learn genre-specific characteristics from spectrograms without manual feature engineering.
Automated Classification: Trains on labeled datasets (e.g., GTZAN, FMA) and predicts the genre of new audio inputs with high accuracy.

blogs.title: What is an Image and How Computers see Images?
blogs.author: on Medium (Mar 2025)
blogs.reference: An image is a visual representation. An image can be two-dimensional, such as a drawing, painting, or photograph, or three-dimensional, such as a carving or sculpture.
